name: Poll
description: A controlled vocabulary and grammar for naming poll places and transitions.

hasDefinedTerm.name: voteOnce
hasDefinedTerm.description: Represents a single-use voting right; a special place label.

hasDefinedTerm.name: choice{n}
hasDefinedTerm.description: Represents a vote destination for a specific choice number.

hasDefinedTerm.name: VOTE_choice{n}
hasDefinedTerm.description: Represents a voting action for a particular choice.

hasDefinedTerm.name: CAST_choice{n}
hasDefinedTerm.description: Alternative transition label for casting a vote.

hasDefinedTerm.name: VOTE_IF_{condition}_choice{n}
hasDefinedTerm.description: A conditional transition label used when specific eligibility criteria apply.

hasDefinedTerm.name: ROUND{m}_VOTE_choice{n}
hasDefinedTerm.description: A namespaced voting action for a specific round and choice.
